structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM UNINCORPORATED NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION ACT

text.section: Venue of an action against an unincorporated nonprofit association that has filed a certificate of association shall be in the appropriate court.

Venue of an action brought in this Commonwealth against an unincorporated nonprofit association that has not filed a certificate of association shall be brought in accordance with the law applicable to an action brought in this Commonwealth against a general partnership.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 22, effective June 24, 2015.
